_sText:
Please Keep in mind this is my FIRST COMPLETE MAP I'VE EVER MADE!!!!
So please be honest in the comments so i can get better at this! Thx!!

This is a multi Arena map that is a mix of Sniper, Deagle, Iceworld, GG and I added my own creation, a fire arena 
section.

The map takes place in a late afternoon setting and it is well lit for combat,
The Fire Arena is meant to be dark and gloomy to give it the right feel i wanted.

One problem is the entrance to the Fire Area had a stupid glitch that i cant get rid of. It looks
as if you cant go down the pipe due to peices of the floor in the middle of the pipe but you can go thru 
it.

Other than that the map is basically done!
if i fix that problem i will resubmit it!

ENJOY!!

The map is good for gun games or just for fun!!!!

MERCK
